statements: SELECT * FROM business_performance WHERE profit > 10000 ORDER BY profit DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM business_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses FROM business_performance
SELECT * FROM business_performance WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, profit FROM business_performance WHERE profit < 0
SELECT * FROM business_performance WHERE revenue > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, revenue, expenses FROM business_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM business_performance WHERE expenses < revenue ORDER BY profit ASC
SELECT id, profit FROM business_performance WHERE profit < expenses * 0.5
SELECT date, expenses, profit FROM business_performance WHERE id % 2 = 0 ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM Performance WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT id, date, impressions FROM Performance WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, clicks, conversion_rate FROM Performance WHERE date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM Revenue WHERE product_id = 123 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM Revenue WHERE revenue < 500 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, date, impressions, clicks, conversion_rate FROM Performance WHERE date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY clicks DESC, conversion_rate ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM Revenue GROUP BY date HAVING total_revenue > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, date, clicks FROM Performance WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT date, product_id, revenue FROM Revenue WHERE revenue > 500 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, impressions, conversion_rate FROM Performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY impressions DESC, conversion_rate ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, date, clicks, conversions FROM performance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, owner, location FROM business WHERE owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM revenue WHERE product_id = 12345 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions > 10;
SELECT id, name, location FROM business WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, location FROM business ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM revenue WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, revenue FROM business JOIN revenue ON business.id = revenue.product_id WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT owner, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM business GROUP BY owner HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM performance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM performance;
SELECT * FROM performance WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance JOIN products ON performance.revenue = products.price;
SELECT * FROM performance;
SELECT date, revenue FROM performance ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT SUM(sales) AS total_sales FROM performance;
SELECT employee_id, name, job_title FROM employee WHERE location='New York';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT performance_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM performance GROUP BY performance_id HAVING total_revenue > 5000;

SELECT employee.emp_id, employee.name, employee.job_title, performance.revenue FROM employee JOIN performance ON employee.emp_id = performance.performance_id WHERE performance.revenue > 1000 ORDER BY performance.revenue DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM product GROUP BY category HAVING avg_price > 50 ORDER BY avg_price ASC;

SELECT customer.customer_name, product.product_name, order_details.quantity FROM customer JOIN order_details ON customer.customer_id = order_details.customer_id JOIN product ON order_details.product_id = product.product_id WHERE order_details.quantity >= 3 ORDER BY customer.customer_name, product.product_name;
